Replace.Text: This unit can use an action to convert adjacent Barbarians into friendly units, but this action will remove the unit.
While taking damage, the unit does not suffer a combat penalty.

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", the game is located in the ocean cell at the beginning, land units can board ships and have the ability to enter the ocean cell, and pioneers can build cities in the sea area. +2 [ICON_Science] technology value and +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value every round before opening up the first city. [NEWLINE]Units ignore the additional [ICON_Movement] movement cost from embarking and disembarking. Not subject to flood damage.

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", for each suzerain state that becomes two city-states of the same type, a corresponding policy slot will be added. Your Theater Plaza building gains an additional [ICON_GreatWork_Music] Great Work of Music slot. [NEWLINE]The cost of recruiting city-state units has been halved, and grant them +2[ICON_Movement] movement and +5[ICON_Strength] combat strength. [ICON_Gold] gold and resources spent when collecting unit upgrades -75%. When recruiting troops from a city-state, you can get 2 [ICON_Envoy] envoys from the city-state.

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", when an emergency occurs, an additional bonus will be obtained. Earn rewards even if emergency events are not completed. [NEWLINE]When you create a [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route with a more advanced civilization, you can get the corresponding [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka or [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse. [NEWLINE] Whenever other civilizations get [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer, [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist, [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant or [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General, you trigger a [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka: Whenever other civilizations get [ICON_GreatProphet] ] Great Prophet, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist or [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Admiral of the Navy, you trigger a [ICON_CivicBoosted] apocalypse. [NEWLINE]The professional area of ​​the city where the third-level chief executive is located provides 1 corresponding [ICON_greatperson] great person point.

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", all cities +10% [ICON_Gold] gold coins; the capital additionally +10% [ICON_Gold] gold coins. All [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes +1 [ICON_Gold] gold. Allows buying regions with [ICON_Gold] coins.

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Jiufan", the improved strategic resources +2 [ICON_Science] science and technology value, and cities with happiness can get an additional +5% [ICON_Science] science and technology value. Cities with ecstatic happiness get double the bonus. The [ICON_Governor] chief executive who works in the city can provide +3% [ICON_Science] technology value every time he gets an enhancement.

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", foreign cities adjacent to special units have -1 [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty every round. Looting a grid in an enemy city will cost the city 5 points of [ICON_Loyalty]. If the cities of other civilizations leave the civilization due to the decrease of [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty, and each round has the highest [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty to you, then the city will directly skip the free city stage and directly join your civilization. Every Spy starts with a free upgrade to Agent.
Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Jiuban", it has the characteristics of all other dress-up Miku.

Uniform Meijiu characteristic buildings. This building provides 2 slots for [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] writings, [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music and any kind of [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] art. [NEWLINE]Reward 1 title of [ICON_Governor].
Lu Xiao Mei Jiu characteristic building. [NEWLINE]Owns [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music masterpiece. Cannot be built if there is already an Archeology Museum or Art Museum in the Theater Square area.
Theme bonus is doubled when showing [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music from different musicians.

Lu Xiao Mei Jiu characteristic building. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1[ICON_Culture] culture value, +2[ICON_Gold] gold coins. +2 [ICON_Appeal] Charisma. After continuous progress in the technology and civic trees, additional [ICON_Culture] culture value and [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance can be obtained. Cannot be built on snow, tundra, snow hills, tundra hills or next to other gardens.
When you produce divas, consume great musicians, and obtain musical masterpieces, there is a certain chance of recruiting Miku. She owns five [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music works.

Lu Xiao Mei Jiu's unique support unit, which can heal adjacent units and replaces rock bands. [NEWLINE] After running the Pojun Diva project, the corresponding ability can be provided to adjacent units. [NEWLINE]Rock concerts can be performed in valid venues, including wonders, areas with required buildings, or special cell targets allowed by band promotions. Their album sales data is the [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance strength that the next concert is expected to bring. After performing in concert, their band level can be improved. Must be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith. It is not possible to perform on the same cell twice.
The iconic Miku unique medieval light cavalry unit that replaces the Stalker. [NEWLINE]Each adjacent recruited unit gives it +3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
Breaking the Army and Bearing the Shield

Kasuga Miku characteristic classical era support unit. [NEWLINE]Non-cavalry land units on the same cell as it defend +4[ICON_Strength] combat strength. [NEWLINE] After unlocking the technology "Gunpowder", you will be eliminated, but you can be promoted to a medical soldier.
+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against non-cavalry land units on the same cell.

Kasuga Miku Featured Atomic Age Support Unit. [NEWLINE]Greatly increases damage against melee, ranged and anti-cavalry units (+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength). Ineffective against other units, but able to preferentially target enemy support units.
+20 [ICON_Strength] combat strength against melee, ranged and anti-cavalry units.
+20 Combat Strength against melee, ranged and anti-cavalry units
Kasuga Miku characteristic Renaissance support unit. [NEWLINE]Effective close-range blasting of areas (+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength). Very poorly effective against other targets.
+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking the area.
Kasuga Miku features a modern support unit. [NEWLINE]Effective close-range blasting of areas (+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength). Very poorly effective against other targets.

Kasuga Miku features medieval support units. Ignores the additional [ICON_Movement] movement cost of Forests, Rainforests and Hills. When making a move, form an escort formation with all relevant land units (choose Pathfinder to do it yourself).
Form a formation with land units so that they ignore the additional [ICON_Movement] movement cost of Forests, Rainforests and Hills.

Bunny Girl Miku features Ancient Era heavy cavalry unit, replaces heavy chariot. [NEWLINE]No debuffs against anti-armor units. [ICON_Movement] Movement is 4 if the unit starts its turn on open terrain.

Pumpkin Witch Miku Unique Renaissance melee unit, replaces Musketeer. [NEWLINE]Start with free boosts. Stronger than the Musketeer, the cost is also lower. To train Janissaries, the city must have at least 2 population. If the Praetorians are trained in the city founded by Mijiu, the city will lose 1 point of population.
Nadeko Miku Unique Renaissance melee unit that replaces the Musketeer. [NEWLINE]Heal yourself when you kill an enemy unit.
+30[ICON_Damaged] HP after defeating an enemy unit.

Deep Sea Meijiu features a modern naval unit that replaces submarines. [NEWLINE]The production cost is lower, +1 vision, +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting in ocean cells. Can reveal other invisible units.
